attributes.action: Increase DVSA resources to provide more driving tests
attributes.background:
Reduce backlog and waiting times for driving test UK. Train and employ more examiners. Increase theory and practical driving test costs to help finance additional resources. Improve working conditions and salary for examiners. 
Promote and advertise vacancies for examiners and encourage enrollment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund the DVSA to increase the availability of practical driving tests
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705408
